title: Episode 406 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page covering Episode 406's plot summary, production details, trivia, and character appearances.
contentSummary: Detailed episode information including title, air dates, plot synopsis, character appearances, production credits, and notable trivia such as this being the first two-part Boss Luffy special.

title: Boss Luffy Historical Special - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Wiki page covering the entire Boss Luffy Historical Special arc, including Episodes 406-407 and their connection to previous Boss Luffy episodes.
contentSummary: Overview of the Boss Luffy alternate universe concept, plot details for the mikoshi race arc, and information about how these episodes fit into the broader One Piece timeline.

title: One Piece - Jidaigeki Tokubetsu Hen: Luffy Oyabun Futatabi Kenzan
author: IMDb Contributors
description: IMDb page for Episode 406 with user ratings, basic episode information, and metadata.
contentSummary: Episode 406 has an IMDb rating of 5.6/10, indicating lower viewer reception compared to canon episodes. Includes basic plot summary and air date information.

title: One Piece: 10 Worst Filler Episodes, Ranked
author: CBR Staff
description: Article ranking One Piece's worst filler episodes, with critical discussion of the Boss Luffy Historical Specials and their poor timing between major arcs.
contentSummary: Criticizes the Boss Luffy episodes for interrupting the momentum between Sabaody Archipelago and Amazon Lily arcs. Notes that while not terrible, these episodes don't add to the One Piece experience and are easily skippable.

title: One Piece Diaries #52: Boss Luffy Filler
author: COMICON Blogger
description: Blog post reviewing the Boss Luffy filler episodes from a first-time viewer's perspective, discussing their merit as skippable content.
contentSummary: Reviews Boss Luffy episodes as 'cute' but ultimately skippable. Notes that there wasn't really anything new on offer and getting derailed from the Sabaody arc was disappointing. Recommends skipping unless you're a completionist.

title: One Piece - Boss Luffy Historical Arc Recap
author: TV Tropes Contributors
description: TV Tropes recap page covering the Boss Luffy Historical Arc with plot summary, character roles, and trope analysis.
contentSummary: Comprehensive recap of Episodes 406-407, explaining the alternate universe setting, character roles in Edo period Japan, and how the arc concludes. Clarifies that despite the Japanese setting, there's no connection to the later Wano arc.

title: One Piece: Boss Luffy Appears Again - Filler Academy Podcast
author: Filler Academy
description: Podcast episode dedicated to reviewing and discussing the Boss Luffy filler episodes including Episode 406.
contentSummary: Dedicated podcast discussion of the Boss Luffy episodes, analyzing them as filler content and their place in the One Piece anime.

title: Ep. 406 + 407 Special Historical Arc - LiveJournal Discussion
author: One Piece LiveJournal Community
description: Community discussion thread about Episodes 406-407 from when they originally aired, featuring fan reactions and opinions.
contentSummary: Positive fan discussion praising the Boss Luffy fillers for being upfront about being non-canon. Fans enjoyed Brook's character moments, Zoro's monastic design, and the extensive character cameos throughout the episodes.

title: One Piece: All The Filler Arcs, Ranked According To IMDb
author: Game Rant Staff
description: Article ranking One Piece filler arcs by their IMDb ratings, providing context for the Boss Luffy specials' reception.
contentSummary: Ranks and analyzes various One Piece filler arcs including the Boss Luffy Historical Specials, noting they are 'charming TV through and through' but don't add essential content to the series.

title: Share the World - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Wiki page about the opening theme 'Share the World' by TVXQ, which debuted with Episode 395 and continued through Episode 406.
contentSummary: Information about the 11th One Piece opening theme, performed by TVXQ (Tohoshinki), used for episodes 395-425. Details about the song's length, releases, and the group's other One Piece contributions.
